channel.title: How to change greetings when log in
channel.description:
how can i change when people log in to my server, saying for e.g : -- Welcome to myserver Hope you enjoy your stay! High chance of staff etc...
and when uploading client to say welcome to myserver.. the client will upload in 5 seconds.. etc...

item.title: How to change greetings when log in
item.dc:creator: @Pure_str433 Pure str433
item.description:
@Pure_str433 wrote:

Client.Java is a file under your server’s folder. Open it in a notepad.

Everyone’s gotta start somewhere…

item.title: How to change greetings when log in
item.dc:creator: @Rage-Pk -Rage-Pk
item.description:
@Rage-Pk wrote:

TBH if you don’t know how to change that, I would take your server offline and learn basics.

CNTRL + F search your login message in your client class.

item.title: How to change greetings when log in
item.dc:creator: @Pure_str433 Pure str433
item.description:
@Pure_str433 wrote:

Logging in Message - go to Client.java and Press and Hold Ctrl + F.

In the search box find “Hope you enjoy your stay”, from here you can edit what you need to edit.

Read full topic
